alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pottawatomie County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Earlsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Tecumseh, Earlsboro, Brooksville, and Harjo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor NOAA Weather Radio, local radio stations or available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
